Articles.Content:
I'm trying to download the 1.11.1 game from my account, but get a "forbidden" -error (HTTP ERROR 403).

Are others experiencing this same problem? I.e. is there some issue on the download servers or does this have something to do with my account..
I got the same thing, it says access denied 404.

KSP Store?
Yeah... if I click any of the links for download, nothing happens... I dont get ANY err page load... just a blank tab.

Are either of you on Firefox v85.+?

If so, take a look at my thread, https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/200002-ksp-forum-and-recent-firefox-850-update-https-only-mode/ , try toggling the new HTTPS Only Mode settings, to see if that helps. Please post your findings there. Thanx

Just checked and 1.11.1 Linux pack downloaded without a hitch.

Ubuntu 20.04.2 LTS Firefox v85

 

 

Edited February 7, 2021 by Curveball Anders
doh

Same problem here as the OP. Win10, Chrome and Edge both give me a 403. Firefox doesn't even load anything, much less any kind of HTTP error page.

I tried the 1.11.1 Linux pack for grins, same 403.
Same problem here. Emailed support, am hoping to find a solution soon lol
I see it... I'm passing the word. Sorry about the inconvenience.  Hopefully it will be resolved soon.
Hey guys, sorry for the inconvenience, its back to normal please try again.
